home.heading: Tell your Tails
home.intro: Story planner app. Plan your stories or "tales", or as we like to call them, "tails".

author.heading: The Author
author.info: Here you can store details about yourself, whether it's for a reporter, your editor, the back of your novel or just for you.

author.heading: About the Author
author.intro: Here you can store details about yourself, whether it's personal information or something you think will sound good on your blog.
